title: HOPE -- SCP-5956 Comic
content:

[[module css]]
:root {
  --header-title: "R\0026 C SITE-43";
  --header-subtitle: "SURVIVE ● CONSERVE ● PERSIST";

  --accent: 255, 34, 67;
  --head-font: var(--ui-font);

  --timeDelay: 1s;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
"There's always hope," Nhung? Do you still feel that way?
For my part, I hope you can't feel anything.

//— Reuben Wirth, Archives and Revision//
[[/div]]
